sections.description: AuditMaster helps you verify that your WordPress site is properly configured, stable, and ready for launch. It performs structured Pre‑launch and Post‑launch QA checks across site identity, homepage settings, favicon detection, project context, and server access. Each audit item includes clear indicators and explanations, making it easy for site owners, editors, and developers to understand what needs attention. Ideal for improving site quality, maintaining standards, and ensuring smooth deployments.

1.0.1084: Fixed the changelog display in the plugin details screen.
1.0.1083: Added a settings popup that appears before starting the QA process.
1.0.1082: Completed all Pre‑launch and Post‑launch QA items.
Implemented full settings management and QA item sorting.
Added dashboard with percentage indicators for QA progress.
Enabled exporting of checklists and credentials.
General bug fixes and stability improvements.
